fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: Craft a rune at night, during the next day, place the rune at your targets house, this will cancel all day abilities to your target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Runes will cause all abilities to fail.
- Umbrae are immune to Runes.
You cannot craft a rune night one.
You may place runes on fellow Umbrae members.
On Full Moon Nights, your rune will frame your targets visitors and role block your target.
- Frames are permanent.
On Blood Moon Nights, your rune will attack all visitors and role block your target.
